div.p: I’ve never been to school, I’ve come from an abusive background and was denied the chance as a child to ever get an education or go to school so
what little bit of education I have, reading, writing my siblings taught me or I taught myself, I taught myself to read and write at around 6 years old
by reading Britannica series of books; the only education I’ve had I went to college 3 years ago to get an NVQ in English and Maths
just so I could have that certificate, without that certificate it’s very hard to get employment without GCSEs, without any education
it’s very hard to do anything these days so any chance, I look back now and if I’d taken some of the chances I was given to go to college earlier
I wish I’d taken them because it would have made things a lot easier now.
